answers.answer: At least you've the date :) congratulations can't wait to get my date lol ... countdown ! Xx

Didn't know you could get a date this early.I'm due Nov 15th..I'm going to ask my OB if I can have my baby earlier.I have Gestational Diabetes and use Insulin and measure my sugar levels all the time.All my meals are carefully measured and planned what time to be consumed and I can't have an apple without planning it in ahead.I need to ecercise more than other pregnant ladies..and keeping a log book of everything and working.. then let's not forget the regular pregnancy perks.It's every day too.I am exhausted. Just done.I need to have my baby earlier :(Do you think my OB can do anything for me?
Oh yes.. sorry rant!I had a lot on my mind.Congratulations on your date.The real count down can begin now for you.

question: My scheduled C-section is the 14th but I'm due the 21st!
title: November babies
